alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 10 at 1:16PM MST until March 11 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph today and tonight. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected Saturday. * WHERE...Central Highlands and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 AM MST Saturday. For the High Wind Warning, from 4 AM to 6 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
